details.title: Cryptanalysis and improvement of piveteau signature scheme with message recovery
details.abstract: Piveteau signature scheme allows message recovery but the methodology differs from that of the Nyberg-Rueppel schemes. This paper analyzes the security of the Piveteau scheme by designing some attacks. Two improved methods to Piveteau signature scheme and Nyberg-Rueppel schemes were developed to avoid these weaknesses. Analyses of the security of the improved schemes prove that the improved methods can effectively handle the attacks proposed in this paper.
